price: Basi Firauni akawatuma mijini wapiga mbiu za mgambo.
footnotes: Firauni akawatuma askari wake katika miji ya mamlaka yake, wawakusanye wenye maguvu katika kaumu yake, alipo jua kuwa Musa kesha toka na Wana wa Israili, ili awazuie lile walilo kusudia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
